name: Purple Heart
description: The **Purple Heart Cape** is a cape that was given out as part of the 15 Days of Minecraft celebrations, alongside the Follower's cape and the 15th Anniversary cape.
obtaining: Players could receive this cape by redeeming a code, which was obtainable by watching any Minecraft livestream on Twitch for 15 minutes. This event started on May 17, 2024 and ended on June 18, 2024.
